# SSW Website
>  SSW is a technology consulting company specializing in .NET, Azure, AI, and web development, providing expert consulting, training, and development services since 1990.

## Core Resources
- [About SSW](https://www.ssw.com.au/company/about-us/): Company information and mission
- [Services](https://www.ssw.com.au/consulting/): Our technology services
- [Rules](https://www.ssw.com.au/rules/): Development best practices

## Technology Focus
- [.NET Development](https://www.ssw.com.au/rules/rules-to-better-net-projects/): .NET guidelines
- [Azure Solutions](https://www.ssw.com.au/rules/rules-to-better-azure/): Azure implementation
- [Successful Projects](https://www.ssw.com.au/rules/rules-to-successful-projects/): Project standards

## Knowledge Base
- [Articles](https://www.ssw.com.au/articles/): Technical articles and insights from our team
  - Latest articles cover topics like EF Core migrations, Microsoft tools in education, and .NET modernization
  - Expert insights from our software engineers and architects
  - Real-world solutions and case studies

## AI Solutions
- [AI Consulting](https://www.ssw.com.au/consulting/artificial-intelligence/): Custom AI implementation services
  - Intelligent automation solutions
  - Secure and compliant AI models
  - Enterprise-level AI expertise
  - Featured solution: YakShaver - AI-powered work item management

## Optional
- [Blog](https://www.ssw.com.au/articles/): Latest articles
- [Events](https://www.ssw.com.au/events/): Training and events
- [Contact](https://www.ssw.com.au/company/contact-us/): Contact information
